update pm_proc_pg set proc_id = #{procId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pg_id = #{pgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_default = #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select pm_proc_pg.id, proc_id, pm_proc_pg.pg_id,pg_name, is_default from pm_proc_pg left JOIN pm_pg on pm_pg.pg_id=pm_proc_pg.pg_id WHERE proc_id = #{proc_id} and pm_proc_pg.status = '1' order by id
